codeReview.summary: Feature implementation is substantial (self-doc root action, hint-tier module, tests, and changeset), but one required behavior from VAL-HINT-001 is not met.

issues.description: The root no-subcommand mode check only considers `--json`, `OUTFITTER_JSON`, and `OUTFITTER_JSONL`. It does not detect non-TTY/piped execution, so piped runs without explicit JSON env/flag fall through to `program.outputHelp()` instead of emitting JSON command tree output, which violates the required 'piped/JSON mode vs TTY help mode' behavior.

summary: Review failed: VAL-HINT-001 is not fully satisfied because piped (non-TTY) root invocations are not mapped to JSON command-tree output.
